verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}When the Father sent His Son to live with us our lives to mend He placed His love upon the alter that we might ascend.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}All that I can do is thank Him All that I can do is pray All that I can do is lift my heart to sing His praise.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Lord, the blessed life you give me and the holy road you choose Lead me all the way by Calvary and I’ll follow You.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Lord, I only want Your favor while I’m sitting at Your feet Nothing in this world can woo me from Your holy seat.{/lang-eng}
